thread.title: With a 3-1 first leg advantage, Real Madrid have failed to advance four times | MARCA in English
thread.title_full: With a 3-1 first leg advantage, Real Madrid have failed to advance four times | MARCA in English

title: With a 3-1 first leg advantage, Real Madrid have failed to advance four times | MARCA in English
text:
Real Madrid 3-1 Napoli History gives Napoli reason for optimism Updated 16/02/2017 00:06 
T o win 3-1 in the first leg sets up the return match nicely , but that hasn't always been synonymous with progressing to the next round for Real Madrid. 
On eight occassions, after winning the first leg at home, Los Blancos have failed to advance four times, a rate of only 50 percent. 
Four of those eight matches came in the Champions League, and only once did the club fail to reach the next round, back in 1978/79 against Grasshopper. 
It is in the UEFA Cup that Real have had worse luck after a dominant first leg 3-1 performance at the Estadio Santiago Bernabeu, as PSV, PSG, and Kaiserslautern have all dumped them out of the competition.
